#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

vector <int> primes = {2,3,5};

inline
bool is_prime(int n)
{
    if(n < 2) return 0;
    for(int i=0;primes[i]*primes[i]<=n;++i)
	if(n % primes[i] == 0)
	    return 0;
    return 1;
}

void generate_primes(int n)
{
    for(int i=7;i<=n;i+=2)
	if(is_prime(i))
	    primes.push_back(i);
}

int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0);
    generate_primes(31623);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n, ans;
        cin>>n;
        for(int i=0;primes[i]<=n and i<primes.size();++i)
        {
            if(n % primes[i] == 0)
            {
                ans = primes[i];
                while(n % primes[i] == 0)
                    n /= primes[i];
            }
        }
        if(n>1) ans = n;
        cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
